verses: Ne nemixe'ukiyari, nekanixewairitiaka 'uka pemanayexeiyarie 'aniwema meta, yuriki nekanixenaki'erieka -ne xeikia pikatixai, matsi tanaiti temeitima tita yuri miraine tepixenaki'erie-,
tita yuri miraine tahetsie miyekaki meta, mitatsiteitaki yuheyemeki:

Kakaiyari ta'ukiyari, Ketsutsi Kiritsitu ta'ukiyari nu'aya, yuriki me'utiyuati meteyukanaki'erieti, 'aixia mekete'u'iyarini xehetsiemieme, mekexenenimayaka, mekexepitiaka yu'iyaritsie xemika'uximatiariekaki.
Waikawa nepinetemawiekai nemitimarieki 'aniwema hipati tita yuri mirainetsie metewiyati memu'uwaki, 'aitsika ta'ukiyari hetsia mieme ketemite'upitiarie.
Hikiri 'uka hekwameki nemati'aitiati nepikamati'utiirie, miki 'aitsika tsutiapai temeixeiyakai nepimati'utiirie pita. 'Ipai nepimatiwawirie, tanaiti temitanaki'eriekaki.
'Ipai tekateniyurieka xika teteyukanaki'erieka: Miki ta'ukiyari mi'u'itiarie kepauka temeixeiyakai. Miki hekwameki kemiti'u'itiarie, 'ipai miki miki pemi'enieniki: pemitanaki'eriekaki.
Waika tewi xeikia memipukawanawatiwe kwiepa, mepiwa'aitiani, Ketsutsi Kiritsitu pikaheuyewetse tewi hikiki kaxite yu'iyarieya kaniyeyeika. Miki tewi, 'axatiuxeiyarieme meta 'axati'uximayatame.
Pikene'a'iwiyani, yuri pemikati'uwixieniki, miki 'aixia pepitiyu'uwaniki miki kwinimieme Kakaiyari 'aixia miki piwatewahe.

Kemi'ane tewi mipai mitiwanawe, pika'umati'enieni Ketsutsi Kiritsitu hekwameya mititawewieni, 'atsimikaheuyewetse Kakaiyari hetsia. Kemi'ane miki mititawewieni, miki yuheyemeki Kakaiyari hetsie meta nu'aya hetsie mi'aneni.
Kemi'ane tewi xehetsia nuani, pika'umatiani, 'ipai pikayukawixieni, kapa xehetsie piyanani.
Kapa xehetsie mitiyana miki, mitayutatuati miki 'axamitiyurie tita.

Waikawa niuki kwinimieme nemikatekuxatiani, peru pikanaheuyewi nekanixekuxaxatiwani kiyeximama meta tsukuamama. Matsi nepinatinake yuyani xehetsia nemireye'axieni, mipai matsi temitakuxatiani, miki tatemawierika kanimarika.
'Uka pemanayexeiyarie 'aniwema yu'iitama memiyuyuwairiya Kakaiyari hetsiemieme, xehetsiena mipai memixewairitiaka.
